thread.title: Samtec Appoints Richardson RFPD as an Authorized Distributor for RF & Microwave Solutions
thread.title_full: Samtec Appoints Richardson RFPD as an Authorized Distributor for RF & Microwave Solutions

author: Editorial Team
title: Samtec Appoints Richardson RFPD as an Authorized Distributor for RF & Microwave Solutions
text:
Fill one form and get quotes for cable assemblies from multiple manufacturers
Samtec, the service leader in the connector industry, has signed Richardson RFPD as an authorized distributor of the full line of Samtec’s RF cable and connector products, including the new family of distinctive orange Nitrowave™ high-performance microwave cable assemblies that are phase and amplitude stable with flexure.
Richardson RFPD, an Arrow Company, is an award-winning distributor known for its industry-leading expertise in RF and microwave products, providing system designers with a range of specialized components and expert design support. Richardson RFPD has over 400 employees and more than 35 locations across the globe, and regional distribution hubs in Asia, Europe, and North America.
“At Samtec, Sudden Service® drives everything we do, from developing high-performance interconnect solutions to selecting distribution partners” said Rick Skees, VP of Distribution, Samtec. “Samtec’s RF solutions have grown dramatically in the last few years, with industry-leading products that support a wide range of applications. We are very pleased that Richardson RFPD will be representing Samtec products in this highly specialized global market.”
Samtec offers complete RF interconnect solutions supporting traditional sub-6 GHz frequencies to 110 GHz microwave/mmWave frequencies (sub-Terahertz spectrum). Products include end-to-end RF cable assemblies, board connectors, cable connectors, adaptors, and Samtec unique Original RF Solutions, such as the Bulls Eye® high-performance test assembly and Magnum RF® ganged, multi-port, high-frequency connectors. Samtec’s products can be found in electronic products used in many applications, including datacom, AI/ML, military/aerospace, industrial, medical, test, computer/semiconductor, automotive, and consumer.
The full line of Samtec RF products are available from Richardson RFPD.
